reviews.comments: The apartment is larger than the pictures suggest.  Nice modern kitchen, and 2 full bedrooms and bathrooms.  Access was easy and just walk out your door and there is all sorts of nightlife just a block away.
reviews.originalComments: The apartment is larger than the pictures suggest.  Nice modern kitchen, and 2 full bedrooms and bathrooms.  Access was easy and just walk out your door and there is all sorts of nightlife just a block away.
reviews.response: Thank you very much Nathan!

reviews.comments:
Enjoyed our 3 night stay here. Apartment is located in a very lively, niche neighborhood, late night bars/restaurants etc., but having food and drink easily accessible was great. Recycling on street was early morning, but that is found anywhere in the city.
Apartment interior was eclectic and fun. Great storage for hanging clothes. Will definitely stay again.
reviews.originalComments:
Enjoyed our 3 night stay here. Apartment is located in a very lively, niche neighborhood, late night bars/restaurants etc., but having food and drink easily accessible was great. Recycling on street was early morning, but that is found anywhere in the city.
Apartment interior was eclectic and fun. Great storage for hanging clothes. Will definitely stay again.
reviews.response: Thank you very much!

reviews.comments: Fantastic apartment in our favorite neighborhood. The layout is functional and comfortable. Riccardo was very responsive—when we had an AC issue, he had a technician there that same afternoon.
reviews.originalComments: Fantastic apartment in our favorite neighborhood. The layout is functional and comfortable. Riccardo was very responsive—when we had an AC issue, he had a technician there that same afternoon.
reviews.response: Thank you very much Axel!

reviews.comments: We loved our stay here.  Property was beautiful and the host was very attentive and responsive to any questions.  the neighborhood was amazing, walkable to many restaurants (also the host left a great list of recommendations!) I would recommend this property highly.
reviews.originalComments: We loved our stay here.  Property was beautiful and the host was very attentive and responsive to any questions.  the neighborhood was amazing, walkable to many restaurants (also the host left a great list of recommendations!) I would recommend this property highly.
reviews.response: Thank you Sheila

reviews.comments:
Fabulous place to stay, just off the really busy parts of Trastevere but close to restaurants and everything walkable. Host was great, proactive communications and great recommendations for restaurants and luggage storage. Set up driver service for us from airport so no waiting.
We will definitely be back , hopefully for longer than a weekend.
reviews.originalComments:
Fabulous place to stay, just off the really busy parts of Trastevere but close to restaurants and everything walkable. Host was great, proactive communications and great recommendations for restaurants and luggage storage. Set up driver service for us from airport so no waiting.
We will definitely be back , hopefully for longer than a weekend.
reviews.response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review Claire!

reviews.comments:
We absolutely loved our stay at this apartment in Trastevere area in the heart of Rome. Close to every attraction and great Resturant’s.
The space had everything we could possibly need — full amenities that made it feel like home while still giving us that authentic Italian vibe we were hoping for. It was spotless, thoughtfully decorated, and perfectly located to explore the city.
Communication with the host was exceptional — friendly, attentive, and always quick to respond, which made the whole experience seamless and stress-free. We truly felt welcomed and cared for.
If you’re looking for a place that combines comfort, cleanliness, and a real Roman charm, this is it. We can’t wait to come back!
reviews.originalComments:
We absolutely loved our stay at this apartment in Trastevere area in the heart of Rome. Close to every attraction and great Resturant’s.
The space had everything we could possibly need — full amenities that made it feel like home while still giving us that authentic Italian vibe we were hoping for. It was spotless, thoughtfully decorated, and perfectly located to explore the city.
Communication with the host was exceptional — friendly, attentive, and always quick to respond, which made the whole experience seamless and stress-free. We truly felt welcomed and cared for.
If you’re looking for a place that combines comfort, cleanliness, and a real Roman charm, this is it. We can’t wait to come back!
reviews.response: Thank you very much Yasser!

reviews.comments: Great location in Trastevere! Lots of restaurants and bars nearby. The apartment was very easy to find and the app made it easy to get in/out of. All the rooms were very clean and looked exactly as pictured
reviews.originalComments: Great location in Trastevere! Lots of restaurants and bars nearby. The apartment was very easy to find and the app made it easy to get in/out of. All the rooms were very clean and looked exactly as pictured
reviews.response: Thank you very much

reviews.comments: The location of this apartment is great however compared to other places in this price range this apartment is overpriced. The apartment is clean and tidy however it is in need of furnishing upgrades especially the beds. The couch is also covered with blankets to hide wear which doesn’t seem fitting for a “luxury” accommodation. The outside terraces are great but the furniture in each of those is also broken. Overall we enjoyed our stay but were a little disappointed in the accommodations.
reviews.originalComments: The location of this apartment is great however compared to other places in this price range this apartment is overpriced. The apartment is clean and tidy however it is in need of furnishing upgrades especially the beds. The couch is also covered with blankets to hide wear which doesn’t seem fitting for a “luxury” accommodation. The outside terraces are great but the furniture in each of those is also broken. Overall we enjoyed our stay but were a little disappointed in the accommodations.
reviews.response: Hi Megan, that's strange because the apartment has been recently renovated, especially the bathroom is brand new and all our guests are pleasantly surprised by the decor and the terraces! But we will try to improve, thank you

reviews.comments: Loved our stay!  Right in the center of Trastevere and about 5 minute walk from the Tiber and so many key attractions. Such a great home base for anything and everything you’d want to do while in Rome. The apartment was clean and well appointed - exactly as advertised. Communication was always prompt and responsive. Cannot recommend enough!
reviews.originalComments: Loved our stay!  Right in the center of Trastevere and about 5 minute walk from the Tiber and so many key attractions. Such a great home base for anything and everything you’d want to do while in Rome. The apartment was clean and well appointed - exactly as advertised. Communication was always prompt and responsive. Cannot recommend enough!
reviews.response: Thank you very much Scott!

reviews.comments: Our stay with Roman Holidays in Trastevere was perfect! Trastevere is a very lively night spot with so many people, bars, and restaurants. We were in the heart of all that in a quiet, peaceful, comfortable, recently renovated apartment. This home was convenient to all the major sites, well appointed, and comfortable. We would love to stay with Roman Holidays again!
reviews.originalComments: Our stay with Roman Holidays in Trastevere was perfect! Trastevere is a very lively night spot with so many people, bars, and restaurants. We were in the heart of all that in a quiet, peaceful, comfortable, recently renovated apartment. This home was convenient to all the major sites, well appointed, and comfortable. We would love to stay with Roman Holidays again!
reviews.response: Thank you very much Hank!

reviews.comments: Well located in a quiet part of Trastevere, but still only steps from the main piazza and a great selection of restaurants, the Conad supermarket and TAXI rank.  A very spacious apartment that is well equipped.  Stylish bathrooms and kitchen and with the old wooden beam ceiling - it makes for a very comfortable space.  The bedrooms are large.
reviews.originalComments: Well located in a quiet part of Trastevere, but still only steps from the main piazza and a great selection of restaurants, the Conad supermarket and TAXI rank.  A very spacious apartment that is well equipped.  Stylish bathrooms and kitchen and with the old wooden beam ceiling - it makes for a very comfortable space.  The bedrooms are large.
reviews.response: Thank you very much Ross!

reviews.comments: Fantastic location, comfortable bed and great bathrooms with very powerful showers
reviews.originalComments: Fantastic location, comfortable bed and great bathrooms with very powerful showers
reviews.response: Thank you very much Annabel!

reviews.comments: L'appartamento è più grande di quanto suggeriscano le foto. Bella cucina moderna e 2 camere da letto e bagni completi. L'accesso è facile e basta uscire dalla porta e c'è tutta una serie di locali notturni a soli un isolato di distanza.

reviews.comments: [FR] The location of this apartment is great however compared to other places in this price range this apartment is overpriced. The apartment is clean and tidy however it is in need of furnishing upgrades especially the beds. The couch is also covered with blankets to hide wear which doesn’t seem fitting for a “luxury” accommodation. The outside terraces are great but the furniture in each of those is also broken. Overall we enjoyed our stay but were a little disappointed in the accommodations.

reviews.originalResponse: Hi Megan, that's strange because the apartment has been recently renovated, especially the bathroom is brand new and all our guests are pleasantly surprised by the decor and the terraces! But we will try to improve, thank you

reviews.comments: [ES] Loved our stay!  Right in the center of Trastevere and about 5 minute walk from the Tiber and so many key attractions. Such a great home base for anything and everything you’d want to do while in Rome. The apartment was clean and well appointed - exactly as advertised. Communication was always prompt and responsive. Cannot recommend enough!
reviews.originalComments: Loved our stay!  Right in the center of Trastevere and about 5 minute walk from the Tiber and so many key attractions. Such a great home base for anything and everything you’d want to do while in Rome. The apartment was clean and well appointed - exactly as advertised. Communication was always prompt and responsive. Cannot recommend enough!
reviews.response: [ES Host] Thank you very much Scott!

reviews.comments: [ES] Our stay with Roman Holidays in Trastevere was perfect! Trastevere is a very lively night spot with so many people, bars, and restaurants. We were in the heart of all that in a quiet, peaceful, comfortable, recently renovated apartment. This home was convenient to all the major sites, well appointed, and comfortable. We would love to stay with Roman Holidays again!
reviews.originalComments: Our stay with Roman Holidays in Trastevere was perfect! Trastevere is a very lively night spot with so many people, bars, and restaurants. We were in the heart of all that in a quiet, peaceful, comfortable, recently renovated apartment. This home was convenient to all the major sites, well appointed, and comfortable. We would love to stay with Roman Holidays again!
reviews.response: [ES Host] Thank you very much Hank!

reviews.comments: [ES] Well located in a quiet part of Trastevere, but still only steps from the main piazza and a great selection of restaurants, the Conad supermarket and TAXI rank.  A very spacious apartment that is well equipped.  Stylish bathrooms and kitchen and with the old wooden beam ceiling - it makes for a very comfortable space.  The bedrooms are large.
reviews.originalComments: Well located in a quiet part of Trastevere, but still only steps from the main piazza and a great selection of restaurants, the Conad supermarket and TAXI rank.  A very spacious apartment that is well equipped.  Stylish bathrooms and kitchen and with the old wooden beam ceiling - it makes for a very comfortable space.  The bedrooms are large.
reviews.response: [ES Host] Thank you very much Ross!

reviews.comments: [ES] Fantastic location, comfortable bed and great bathrooms with very powerful showers
reviews.originalComments: Fantastic location, comfortable bed and great bathrooms with very powerful showers
reviews.response: [ES Host] Thank you very much Annabel!

reviews.comments: We loved our stay! The location is perfect and the apartment had everything we needed. The entire apartment was spotless and very clean. Our host, Riccardo, was very responsive, arranged a driver, and gave excellent restaurant recommendations. While the apartment is in an area of town that is lively and festive at night, it didn't bother us at all. We would gladly stay there again. Thanks again, Riccardo!
reviews.originalComments: We loved our stay! The location is perfect and the apartment had everything we needed. The entire apartment was spotless and very clean. Our host, Riccardo, was very responsive, arranged a driver, and gave excellent restaurant recommendations. While the apartment is in an area of town that is lively and festive at night, it didn't bother us at all. We would gladly stay there again. Thanks again, Riccardo!
reviews.response: Thank you so much Beth!

reviews.comments:
A fantastic stay in Trastevere, if you want to be in the hustle and bustle this is the spot.
The apartment is curated beautifully and designed extremely well, it is very spacious and comfortable, the fixtures and fittings are all modern and functional.
The WiFi struggled to get to the bedroom occasionally perhaps the extension needs to be added to the overall instructions.
We would absolutely book again and the host was very polite and helpful.
reviews.originalComments:
A fantastic stay in Trastevere, if you want to be in the hustle and bustle this is the spot.
The apartment is curated beautifully and designed extremely well, it is very spacious and comfortable, the fixtures and fittings are all modern and functional.
The WiFi struggled to get to the bedroom occasionally perhaps the extension needs to be added to the overall instructions.
We would absolutely book again and the host was very polite and helpful.
reviews.response: Thank you so much Sam, it was a great pleasure to have you as guests. As you could see, the smart TV works perfectly in the bedroom so this issue with the WIFI is totally new to me, but I will make the necessary checks and will definitely consider the possibility of installing a repeater! Thank you for the very appreciated note, I hope to have you back as guests in Rome soon!

reviews.comments:
Delight! The apartment in the heart of Trastevere is the best location! Clean, spacious— everything is as in the photo.
The main advantage: you opened the door and you were already in the midst of Roman life! Bars, restaurants, atmosphere — everything is right on the doorstep. At the same time, all the main attractions (Colosseum, Pantheon, etc.) are within easy walking distance.
An ideal base for those who want to be in the center of events and walk. 10/10, I recommend it!
reviews.originalComments:
Delight! The apartment in the heart of Trastevere is the best location! Clean, spacious— everything is as in the photo.
The main advantage: you opened the door and you were already in the midst of Roman life! Bars, restaurants, atmosphere — everything is right on the doorstep. At the same time, all the main attractions (Colosseum, Pantheon, etc.) are within easy walking distance.
An ideal base for those who want to be in the center of events and walk. 10/10, I recommend it!
reviews.response: Thank you so much Alla!

reviews.comments: Great modern apartment in the heart of Trastevere. I’m not sure if it was unique to the time we were there, but a few nights there was loud music playing til 12am that made it difficult to sleep. But if you want to be right in the middle of the action, this is a great place to be.
reviews.originalComments: Great modern apartment in the heart of Trastevere. I’m not sure if it was unique to the time we were there, but a few nights there was loud music playing til 12am that made it difficult to sleep. But if you want to be right in the middle of the action, this is a great place to be.
reviews.response: Thank you very much Katelyn!

reviews.comments: Loved our stay at the Luxury Trastevere Airbnb! Charming, spacious, felt like I was staying in a museum. It was in the heart of everything. Not the quietest, but if you like action this is where it’s at. We will definitely be coming back again. Also the host was very responsive and just overall really nice.
reviews.originalComments: Loved our stay at the Luxury Trastevere Airbnb! Charming, spacious, felt like I was staying in a museum. It was in the heart of everything. Not the quietest, but if you like action this is where it’s at. We will definitely be coming back again. Also the host was very responsive and just overall really nice.
reviews.response: Thank you so much Leetal!

reviews.comments: Location was great for what we wanted, fantastic food, cafe, restaurants and very walkable! We had a great time and the host was responsive and very helpful. Would definitely recommend and would stay here again!
reviews.originalComments: Location was great for what we wanted, fantastic food, cafe, restaurants and very walkable! We had a great time and the host was responsive and very helpful. Would definitely recommend and would stay here again!
reviews.response: Thank you so much for this review!

reviews.comments: Abbiamo adorato il nostro soggiorno! La posizione è perfetta e l'appartamento aveva tutto ciò di cui avevamo bisogno. L'intero appartamento era impeccabile e molto pulito. Il nostro host, Riccardo, è stato molto reattivo, ha organizzato un autista e ci ha dato ottime raccomandazioni per ristoranti. Anche se l'appartamento si trova in una zona della città vivace e festosa di notte, non ci ha infastidito affatto. Ci piacerebbe tornarci volentieri. Grazie ancora, Riccardo!
reviews.originalComments: We loved our stay! The location is perfect and the apartment had everything we needed. The entire apartment was spotless and very clean. Our host, Riccardo, was very responsive, arranged a driver, and gave excellent restaurant recommendations. While the apartment is in an area of town that is lively and festive at night, it didn't bother us at all. We would gladly stay there again. Thanks again, Riccardo!
reviews.response: Grazie mille Beth!

reviews.comments: Un soggiorno fantastico a Trastevere, se vuoi essere nel caos e nella frenesia questo è il posto giusto. L'appartamento è arredato in modo splendido e progettato estremamente bene, è molto spazioso e confortevole, gli arredi sono tutti moderni e funzionali. Il WiFi aveva qualche difficoltà ad arrivare alla camera da letto occasionalmente, forse è necessario aggiungere un ripetitore alle istruzioni generali. Prenoteremmo assolutamente di nuovo e l'host è stato molto educato e disponibile.
reviews.originalComments:
A fantastic stay in Trastevere, if you want to be in the hustle and bustle this is the spot.
The apartment is curated beautifully and designed extremely well, it is very spacious and comfortable, the fixtures and fittings are all modern and functional.
The WiFi struggled to get to the bedroom occasionally perhaps the extension needs to be added to the overall instructions.
We would absolutely book again and the host was very polite and helpful.
reviews.response: Grazie mille Sam, è stato un grande piacere avervi come ospiti. Come hai potuto vedere anche tu, la smart TV prende perfettamente in camera da letto, quindi questo problema del WIFI mi giunge totalmente nuovo. Farò le necessarie verifiche e prenderò sicuramente in considerazione la possibilità di installare un ripetitore! Grazie dell'annotazione molto apprezzata, spero di avervi presto di nuovo come ospiti a Roma!

reviews.comments: Delizia! L'appartamento nel cuore di Trastevere è la migliore posizione! Pulito, spazioso, tutto è come in foto. Il principale vantaggio: apri la porta e sei già nel bel mezzo della vita romana! Bar, ristoranti, atmosfera, tutto è proprio dietro l'angolo. Allo stesso tempo, tutte le principali attrazioni (Colosseo, Pantheon, ecc.) sono facilmente raggiungibili a piedi. Una base ideale per chi vuole essere al centro degli eventi e camminare. 10/10, lo consiglio!
reviews.originalComments:
Delight! The apartment in the heart of Trastevere is the best location! Clean, spacious— everything is as in the photo.
The main advantage: you opened the door and you were already in the midst of Roman life! Bars, restaurants, atmosphere — everything is right on the doorstep. At the same time, all the main attractions (Colosseum, Pantheon, etc.) are within easy walking distance.
An ideal base for those who want to be in the center of events and walk. 10/10, I recommend it!
reviews.response: Grazie mille Alla!

reviews.comments: Fantastico appartamento moderno nel cuore di Trastevere. Non sono sicuro se fosse una cosa unica per il periodo in cui eravamo lì, ma alcune notti c'era della musica ad alto volume fino alle 12 che rendeva difficile dormire. Ma se vuoi essere proprio nel bel mezzo dell'azione, questo è il posto perfetto.
reviews.originalComments: Great modern apartment in the heart of Trastevere. I’m not sure if it was unique to the time we were there, but a few nights there was loud music playing til 12am that made it difficult to sleep. But if you want to be right in the middle of the action, this is a great place to be.
reviews.response: Grazie mille Katelyn!

reviews.comments: Abbiamo adorato il nostro soggiorno nel lussuoso Airbnb di Trastevere! Affascinante, spazioso, sembrava di stare in un museo. Era nel cuore di tutto. Non il posto più silenzioso, ma se ti piace l'azione, è il posto giusto. Torneremo sicuramente. Inoltre, l'host è stato molto reattivo e davvero gentile.
reviews.originalComments: Loved our stay at the Luxury Trastevere Airbnb! Charming, spacious, felt like I was staying in a museum. It was in the heart of everything. Not the quietest, but if you like action this is where it’s at. We will definitely be coming back again. Also the host was very responsive and just overall really nice.
reviews.response: Grazie mille Leetal!

reviews.comments: La posizione era ottima per quello che volevamo, cibo fantastico, caffè, ristoranti e molto comoda da raggiungere a piedi! Ci siamo divertiti molto e l'host è stato reattivo e molto disponibile. Sicuramente consigliato e ci tornerei volentieri!
reviews.originalComments: Location was great for what we wanted, fantastic food, cafe, restaurants and very walkable! We had a great time and the host was responsive and very helpful. Would definitely recommend and would stay here again!
reviews.response: Grazie mille per questa recensione!

reviews.comments: L'appartamento è bellissimo e si trova in una zona davvero divertente e carina. Tutto era pulito e l'azione è proprio fuori dalla porta. Altamente raccomandato. Anche gli host erano adorabili, abbiamo avuto un paio di fraintendimenti e cambiamenti ai nostri piani e sono stati davvero disponibili e gentili al riguardo :)
reviews.originalComments: The apartment is beautiful and in a really fun and pretty area. Everything was clean and the action is right outside the door. Highly recommend. The hosts were lovely too, we had a couple misunderstandings and changes to our plans and they were really helpful and sweet about it :)
reviews.response: Grazie Charlotte

reviews.comments: Consiglio al 100%! Host molto reattivo e disponibile. L'appartamento è davvero stupendo - bellissimo design, interni moderni con tutto il necessario per il soggiorno. Il quartiere è perfetto - vicino a tutto e con ottimi ristoranti e bar entro un raggio di 3 minuti a piedi (senza parlare dell'ottima amatriciana dall'altra parte della strada). Tornerò sicuramente!
reviews.originalComments: 10/10 recommend! Very responsive and helpful host. The apartment itself is a real stunner - beautifully designed, modern interior with everything you need for your stay. The neighborhood is perfect - close to everything and with excellent restaurants and bars within a 3 min walk radius (not to speak of the excellent amatriciana across the street). I’ll definitely be back!
reviews.response: Grazie Anna!

reviews.comments: Che posto incantevole e che host meraviglioso! L'host è incredibilmente comunicativo e reattivo a tutte le domande, anche se alcune delle mie erano un po' sciocche. L'appartamento stesso è confortevole e pulito. Si trova in un quartiere vivace con molte cose da fare e ho trovato facile raggiungere a piedi la maggior parte dei luoghi. Sicuramente tornerò a soggiornare in uno degli appartamenti di questo host.
reviews.originalComments: What a lovely place and a wonderful host! The host is incredibly communicative and responsive to all questions, however silly some of mine were. The apartment itself is comfortable and clean. It’s in a busy neighborhood with a lot to do and i found it easy to walk to most places. I will definitely stay in one of this hosts apartments again.
reviews.response: Grazie mille Amanda!

reviews.comments: È stato un appartamento così bello. Così bello. È ancora meglio di come appare nelle foto. Tutto è di buona qualità, persino coltelli e forchette. Tutto è pulito. Ci sono bei cuscini, materasso e asciugamani. Ma sii pronto che questa zona è molto rumorosa di notte, soprattutto nei fine settimana, quindi potrebbe essere troppo rumorosa se hai il sonno sensibile.
reviews.originalComments: It’s was such a nice apartment. So beautiful. It’s even better than I see on the pictures. Everything is good quality, even knives and forks. Everything is clean. There are nice pillows, mattress and towels. But be ready that this region is very of Rome at night especially on weekends so it can be too loud if you have sensitive sleep.
reviews.response: Grazie mille Oksana!

reviews.comments:
Questa proprietà è meravigliosa! Assolutamente impeccabile. Ogni dettaglio meritava un 10/10, dalla pulizia al design alla funzionalità. Non potrei essere più ossessionato da questa proprietà rispetto a tutti i posti in cui sono mai stato. È stato un posto così incredibile dove trovare riposo dopo le intense giornate di esplorazione delle rovine affascinanti e affollate di Roma. Molto chic. L'armadio merita un post tutto suo. Era enorme e ben organizzato per nascondere i bagagli.
Questa proprietà si trova nel cuore di una zona vivace, quindi c'è così tanto da fare proprio fuori dalla porta, ma questo significa anche che può essere rumoroso di notte. I miei figli, di 9 e 13 anni, usavano il rumore bianco dal loro iPad e riuscivano a dormire bene. Le mattine e i giorni erano tranquilli e incantevoli.
Abbiamo tutti amato questa proprietà, l'host si prende davvero cura e si vanta di uno spazio così unico e speciale. Resteremo solo qui nei nostri futuri viaggi. Grazie mille all'adorabile host reattivo. È stato un viaggio da sogno per noi, non sarebbe stato lo stesso senza un posto così accogliente e lussuoso.
reviews.originalComments:
This property is glorious! Absolutely pristine. Every detail met 10/10 from cleanliness to design to function. I could not be more obsessed with this property out of all the places I have ever traveled. It was such a incredible place to find reprieve from the busy days exploring the beautiful and busy ruins of Rome. Very chic. The closet deserves a post of its own. It was huge and laid out beautifully to hide luggage.
This property is in the heart of a hoping area so there is so much to do at your door step-this also makes for it to be noisy at night. My kids, 9 and 13, used white noise from their ipad and were able to sleep fine. Mornings and days were peaceful and lovely.
We all loved this property, the host really takes pride and care of such a unique special space. We will only ever stay here on our future visits. Thank you so much to the lovely responsive host. It was a dream trip for us, it would not have been the same without such a place to feel like home and also luxurious.
reviews.response: Grazie per questa bella recensione!

reviews.comments: Abbiamo avuto un soggiorno fantastico in questa sistemazione. Lo spazio è esattamente come mostrato nell'annuncio ed era perfettamente pulito. Le istruzioni su come accedere all'unità erano molto chiare e il nostro host, Riccardo, è stato estremamente reattivo e disponibile per qualsiasi domanda avessimo. Se sei sensibile al rumore, sappi che questa unità si trova proprio nel cuore del quartiere della vita notturna, tuttavia era esattamente ciò che io e i miei amici cercavamo, quindi eravamo contenti di essere così vicini a tutti i bar e feste. Mi piacerebbe assolutamente tornare a soggiornare qui la prossima volta che veniamo a Roma e consiglierei vivamente questo posto a chiunque venga qui!
reviews.originalComments: We had such an amazing stay at this accommodation. The space is exactly as pictured in the listing and was totally spotless. Instructions on how to access the unit were very clear and our host, Riccardo, was extremely responsive and helpful with any questions we had. If you’re sensitive to noise, be advised that this unit is located right at the heart of the nightlife district, however it was exactly what my friends and I were looking for so we were glad to be so close to all the bars and parties. I would absolutely love to stay here again next time we come to Rome and would highly recommend this place to anyone coming here!
reviews.response: Grazie mille Nicole!

reviews.comments: [FR] We loved our stay! The location is perfect and the apartment had everything we needed. The entire apartment was spotless and very clean. Our host, Riccardo, was very responsive, arranged a driver, and gave excellent restaurant recommendations. While the apartment is in an area of town that is lively and festive at night, it didn't bother us at all. We would gladly stay there again. Thanks again, Riccardo!

As you could see, the smart TV works perfectly in the bedroom so this issue with the WIFI is totally new to me, but I will make the necessary checks and will definitely consider the possibility of installing a repeater! Thank you for the very appreciated note, I hope to have you back as guests in Rome soon!

reviews.comments: [ES] We loved our stay! The location is perfect and the apartment had everything we needed. The entire apartment was spotless and very clean. Our host, Riccardo, was very responsive, arranged a driver, and gave excellent restaurant recommendations. While the apartment is in an area of town that is lively and festive at night, it didn't bother us at all. We would gladly stay there again. Thanks again, Riccardo!

reviews.comments:
[ES] A fantastic stay in Trastevere, if you want to be in the hustle and bustle this is the spot.
The apartment is curated beautifully and designed extremely well, it is very spacious and comfortable, the fixtures and fittings are all modern and functional.
The WiFi struggled to get to the bedroom occasionally perhaps the extension needs to be added to the overall instructions.
We would absolutely book again and the host was very polite and helpful.
reviews.originalComments:
A fantastic stay in Trastevere, if you want to be in the hustle and bustle this is the spot.
The apartment is curated beautifully and designed extremely well, it is very spacious and comfortable, the fixtures and fittings are all modern and functional.
The WiFi struggled to get to the bedroom occasionally perhaps the extension needs to be added to the overall instructions.
We would absolutely book again and the host was very polite and helpful.
reviews.response: [ES Host] Thank you so much Sam, it was a great pleasure to have you as guests. As you could see, the smart TV works perfectly in the bedroom so this issue with the WIFI is totally new to me, but I will make the necessary checks and will definitely consider the possibility of installing a repeater! Thank you for the very appreciated note, I hope to have you back as guests in Rome soon!
reviews.originalResponse: Thank you so much Sam, it was a great pleasure to have you as guests. As you could see, the smart TV works perfectly in the bedroom so this issue with the WIFI is totally new to me, but I will make the necessary checks and will definitely consider the possibility of installing a repeater! Thank you for the very appreciated note, I hope to have you back as guests in Rome soon!

reviews.comments:
[ES] Delight! The apartment in the heart of Trastevere is the best location! Clean, spacious— everything is as in the photo.
The main advantage: you opened the door and you were already in the midst of Roman life! Bars, restaurants, atmosphere — everything is right on the doorstep. At the same time, all the main attractions (Colosseum, Pantheon, etc.) are within easy walking distance.
An ideal base for those who want to be in the center of events and walk. 10/10, I recommend it!

reviews.comments: [ES] Great modern apartment in the heart of Trastevere. I’m not sure if it was unique to the time we were there, but a few nights there was loud music playing til 12am that made it difficult to sleep. But if you want to be right in the middle of the action, this is a great place to be.
